items.sentence: How did you know that was what I was going to do?
I don't want to stick my nose into your business.
It looks as if it's going to be nice again today.
I'm sorry. I shouldn't have treated you that way.
I'd hardly hung up when the telephone rang again.
I'd hardly put the phone down when it rang again.
Unfortunately, neither of them are alive anymore.
Tom started singing, and everyone else joined in.
Mary had on a pair of expensive-looking earrings.
Tom wanted to take another lap around the course.
